name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience in high-performance application development, skilled in **.NET**, **C#**, **ASP.NET MVC**, **ASP.NET Core**, and **Entity Framework**. Proficient in building robust Web APIs and backend systems with a strong foundation in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript** and **Angular** frameworks, ensuring seamless integration with front-end technologies. Experienced in testing and performance optimization using **NUnit** and **Mock** frameworks. Highly knowledgeable in database management, including **MS SQL Server**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Oracle**.

Adept in developing cloud-native systems, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and ensuring compliance with industry standards. Committed to delivering reliable solutions that enhance operational efficiency. Strong communication skills with a proactive approach to problem-solving, built on a foundation of hands-on expertise in both frontend and backend development.
